basic.title: Basic
basic.description: A set of basic colors, such as Red, Green, and Blue.

html.title: HTML Colors
html.description: HTML/CSS color names. These can be used as keywords in CSS, SVG, or HTML.

japanese-traditional.title: Traditional Colors of Japan
japanese-traditional.description: The traditional colors of Japan are a collection of colors traditionally used in Japanese art, literature, textiles such as kimono, and other Japanese arts and crafts.

le-corbusier.title: Le Corbusier
le-corbusier.description: Architectural colors from Le Corbusier's color system.

nbs-iscc.title: The Universal Color Language
nbs-iscc.description: ISCC–NBS System of Color Designation: a naming system for colors based on 12 basic color terms and a small set of adjective modifiers.

ntc.title: NTC.js
ntc.description: NTC.js color matching library names, released in 2007. The names were collected from various sources such as Wikipedia, X11, and Crayola.

osxcrayons.title: OS X Crayons
osxcrayons.description: OS X Crayons color names, mostly used in the OS X color-picker GUI.

ridgway.title: Robert Ridgway's Color Standards and Color Nomenclature
ridgway.description: Color Nomenclature by Robert Ridgway (1850-1929), published in Washington, DC in 1912. It is part of the public domain in the USA. On August 31, 2020, it was added to the Gutenberg Project.

sanzo-wada-I.title: Wada Sanzō Japanese Color Dictionary Volume I
sanzo-wada-I.description: Names from Wada Sanzō (和田 三造) Colors Dictionary, Volume I.

thesaurus.title: The Color Thesaurus
thesaurus.description: The Color Thesaurus by Ingrid Sundberg. As a writer, she collected color names to explore the emotion of a scene and create variety in her writing.

werner.title: Werner's Nomenclature of Colours
werner.description: All colors from the book Werner's Nomenclature of Colours, collected and described in the late 18th century

windows.title: Microsoft Windows Color Names
windows.description: A list of colors used in legacy Microsoft Windows systems.

wikipedia.title: Wikipedia Color Names
wikipedia.description: A list of color names regularly scraped from Wikipedia.

french.title: French Colors
french.description: A list of French color names.

spanish.title: Spanish Colors
spanish.description: A list of Spanish color names.

german.title: German Colors
german.description: A list of German color names.

x11.title: X11 Color Names
x11.description: Standard Xlib or X11 protocol color names.

xkcd.title: XKCD Colors
xkcd.description: The 954 most common RGB monitor colors, as defined by several hundred thousand participants in the XKCD color name survey.

risograph.title: Risograph Colors
risograph.description: A list of popular colors for Risograph printers. Only includes colors with HEX, Pantone, and Z-Type codes.

chinese-traditional.title: Traditional Colors of China
chinese-traditional.description: Traditional Colors of China: Color aesthetics in the Forbidden City (中国传统色：故宫里的色彩美学), including colors and their transliterations.

hindi.title: Hindi Colors
hindi.description: A list of Hindi color names.
